app.description: Contains information about the simulation engine/application.

compute.description: Unit's specific computational parameters. Overrides computeArgs object inside the Job entity.

name.description: Input file name (for QE and VASP) or script file name (for Shell and Python)

content.description: Content of the input file (for QE and VASP) or content of the script file (for Shell and Python)

ShellArguments.description: Optional arguments passed the Shell or Python script

EnvironmentVariables.description: Optional environment variables exported before running Shell or Python script

pythonVirtualEnvironmentPath.description: Optional path to the virtual environment (only for Python)
